attributes.description: The list of attributes of the work item. Read-only.

id.description: The ID of the work item attribute. Read-only.

value.description: The value of the work item attribute. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the value of a work item attribute. Read-only.

author.description: The user to whom the work is attributed in the work item. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the user. Read-only.

created.description: The date when the work item was created. Can be null.

creator.description: The user who added the work item to the issue. Read-only. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the user. Read-only.

date.description: The date and time that is assigned to the work item. Stored as a Unix timestamp in UTC. The time part is set to midnight for the current date.

duration.description: The duration of the work item.

id.description: The ID of the duration value. Read-only.

minutes.description: Number of minutes in the time interval. Read-only.

presentation.description: Presentation of the time interval according to the user settings of duration format and user locale. Read-only.

id.description: The ID of the issue work item. Read-only.

issue.description: Stores attributes of the issue to which the work item is attached. Read-only.

id.description: The database ID of the issue. Read-only.

text.description: The work item description. Can be null.

type.description: The work item type. Can be null.

id.description: The ID of the work item type. Read-only.

updated.description: The date when the work item was last updated. Can be null.
